issue.title: [CF 979] [Beta] Trouble w/Tracking CS Debuff
issue.body:
http://puu.sh/avEGM/cfb1cea3ec.jpg

As of the latest beta build, Raging Blow has a new mechanic that when you use it inside a Colossus Smash, it will extend the duration of CS by 2 seconds. It seems that as of this latest change, if you RB in a CS that's duration is under 1 seconds, the timer will cease to work. The aura will still show up that signifies that the target is afflicted by the buff, but the timer breaks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #979 | Raw

comments.body:
That's OmniCC doing that - there is a setting for OmniCC for minimum duration to display text. Its default is 3 seconds. You could safely reduce it to 2 seconds to get around this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Oh alright, thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
